channel.title: Server colours (colors) for 317 PI
channel.description:
Hi guys, I use a 317 PI base and I cannot for the life of me work out how the colour system works in the game,
For example <col=255> is blue, yet <col=3000000> is red, I don't have a clue how they relate to each other, And how the scale works.
If there is not pattern, How can I get Red, Green and Blue? I'm guessing the codes work on a scale or individual RGB values... I read on a tut that the colours work in hex (FFFFFF For white) Which is bulls**t. I also tried names of colours.
Thanks a lot, Gergy xWeedscape

item.title: Server colours (colors) for 317 PI
item.dc:creator: @gergy008 gergy008
item.description:
@gergy008 wrote:

I tried @red@ and stuff, It literally says @red@ and doesn’t colour the text.

Read full topic

item.title: Server colours (colors) for 317 PI
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

Use, @red@ @blu@ @dbl@ @or1@ @yel@ @gre@, there are more but i dont rememeber off the top of my head.

like for multi colors do: @red@H@blu@I
that would print hi in red and blue.

Read full topic
